setting.title: Collapse
settings.autoCollapseExplorer.desc: Auto collapse explorer when opening a file.
settings.autoCollapseOutline.desc: Auto collapse Outline when scrolling to a specific section.
settings.showRibbonOnExplorer.desc: Show ribbon on explorer status bar, click to collapse/expand.
settings.showRibbonOnOutline.desc: Show ribbon on outline status bar, click to collapse/expand.
